CustomField.description: Enable this setting (check checkbox) to allow Distributed Marketing to use Marketing Cloud Tenant-Specific Endpoints. Disable this setting (uncheck checkbox) to use legacy authentication. This must be enabled for all customers using dedicated European Data Centers.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable this setting to use Tenant-Specific Endpoints with Distributed Marketing.
CustomField.label: Enable DM Tenant-Specific Endpoints
